page.title: 06Events:Scremerston Gala 1985
page.content: This year the {Gala}was better than ever with a lot more things to do and a lot more sideshows.First there was a {Fancy Dress Parade}led by {Berwick {Pipe Band,}after the judging of the Fancy Dress the band gave a display of marching with the{Majorettes.}Some children from{Berwick Middle School gave a gymnastic display and it was very good.There were some boys doing break dancing. There was a{big bouncer}and it was my first time at the Gala.There was a big children's playpen this year and there were some toys already in it.We had{Crazy Golf,}a{water splash and lots of small sideshows for everyone.All the usual stalls were there,a{bottle stall,a cake stall, {books,toys,sweets,plants,a Bran Tub and a{smashing China stall.A fire {engine}came with the firemen.
